data.message: He's a joke just trying to stay in the public eye. He knows nobody listens to him any more so he jumped on the wagon with all the other snowflake cry babies. Its a shame bc I use to like his music. I think I'll throw all his shit in the garbage...

replies.message: lol haha
What r u talking about? Everyone still listens to him, he just dont got new music so everyone bumps his throwbacks
He hasn't had an album out for years yet he's still #14 in album sales so far this year!

No one listens to eminem? Are you fucking high out of your mind? This guy is still a legend in the music industry. There's 0 stars that would diss eminem even to this day because they know they'll be ripped apart by him.
I'm not saying his old stuff was bad. His music was awesome but his new shit sucks. And as far as ppl dissing him the more he does shit like this he will turn himself into a joke.
32nd most listened artist on Spotify... yeah... no one listens to him. Yeah. Sure. Alright... why not?

What new music did you last listen to of his. Yeah that's right nothing bc his new shit sucks ass. If you only had his new shit to listen to there would of never been a 8 mile. He should stay out of politics and do what he does best.
Best rapper of all time.
Yeah you r definitely right, that he just hop on a wagon to stay in publick eye. As loon as I can remember he was attention seeking artist whom had never spoken about the politics, was he? Hadn't he?
When figure out you're not black and can correctly write a comment. Then you can comment one what I say. You fucking moron.
